ComicInfo.Summary:
Spanning the globe, Dark Horse brings you a world of entertainment: in Rork, by Andreas, the Cemetery of the Cathedrals gives up its secrets. Haldeman and Marvano's The Forever War concludes. Adele finally uncovers the secret of the living mummy, in Tardi's tale. Voyage to Italy reveals Keo's fate. Cailleteau and Vatine show how Fred and Bob turn into comic book creators to get girls. Also included: Phil Elliott's Post-Apocalypse; Rick Geary's Survey of the 20th Century; David Lynch's Angriest Dog in the World. *Story Titles * The Angriest Dog in the World Jordan Chapter 1 Post Apocalypse The Extraordinary Adventures of Adele Blanc-Sec: Mummies On Parade Chapter 5 A Survey of the 20th Century The Forever War Book 3 Chapter 5 Fred & Bob Draw A Comic Book The Voyage To Italy Chapter 11 Rork: The Graveyard of Cathedrals Chapter 5
